resources.string: What type of user are you?
Welcome to the info page directory!\nBelow are the useful links to the information you need!

"ulwireless : DWANMPDJW 
ULSECURE: JWDJAPDJ 
 
 While wifi is available to student on campus, due to the abuse of free wifi, both aforementioned options have been retired. Their replacement, eduroam, is simple to access for students:.
 STEP 1) Select eduroam from the list of available networks.

 (STEP 2) Enter your regular network username and password."

Setting Up an email in UL is simple.
 STEP 1) Use a web browser to access the student portal at this URL: https://portal.office.com. 

 STEP 2) Login using your student email. Your email address is (student number)@studentmail.ul.ie. 

 STEP 3) Enter your email password and login.

 STEP 4) Use your desired application.


 FAQ and other information can be found at https://ulsites.ul.ie/itd/access-your-student-email-account
